attributes.action: Turn the UK into a resource based economy
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XDhSgCsD_x8
 - A resource based economy explained

I'm not going to be pushy, if you think it looks worth a shot, sign it, if not, I don't blame you for being sceptical. However, I will say, if that short video doesn't answer all your questions, it's worth looking into.

This is pretty major change, but I think it's at least worth the government debating.
